page.title: 15FAMILY QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content: {CONT FROM PAGE 14.}...CALDECOTE {SPARE TIME} NICK - CARPENTRY, READING, HOME COMPUTING, GARDENING AND WATCHING TV. THIS GOES ON IN THE HOME. ROWING AND WINDSURFING ON THE RIVER AND ON THE SEA. JANE - YOGA, EMBROIDERY, ENTERTAINS FRIENDS, READINTG, MAKES CLOTHES, GARDENING. THESE ARE DONE AT HOME. ZARA - READS, IRONS, WATCHES TV, PLAYS GAMES, PLAYS RECORDER, COOKS. ALL ARE DONE AT HOME. PATRICK - PLAYS WITH FRIENDS, READS, WATCHES TV AT HOME. ALEX - LISTENS TO TAPE, DOES JIGSAWS, PLAYS WITH LEGO, AT HOME. {FOOD FOR ONE DAY FOR TWO OF THE {HOUSEHOLD} BREAKFAST- ZARA-FRUIT N FIBRE, MILK, FRUIT JUICE. JANE-MUESLI, YOGHURT AND FRUIT, TEA. LUNCH - ZARA-SANDWICHES, FRUIT OR {CONT PAGE 16}
